system.description:
It raises a sword glowing with holy light and floating in the air to protect a place. If an interloper – anyone with low or average Virtue, or approaching with bad intentions – would disturb it, the weapon attacks, and fights them like a knight. The sword is level 3+1 (from fifth level, 4+2), has AC 15, and inflicting 1d10+3 Hp damage. This spell is only kept by the followers of Saint Stephen or Saint Ladislaus of Hungary,

and they will only give it to those who have earned it.
